attributes.action: Ban the production of animal pornography throughout the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Animal pornography is produced in many EU nations, despite the fact that such material has no place in our civilised society. The continuing exploitation of animals must end within the EU and I call upon the British government to raise awareness of this important, but under discussed, issue of animal welfare, and to put forth a proposition to ban all such material throughout Europe.

rejection.details: The Government can not make rules for the EU.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
